game.shortDescription: SULFUR는 현대적인 올드 스쿨 액션 어드벤처 게임입니다. 적을 능가하고 보물을 찾고 무기를 강화하고 힘을 활용하세요. 더 깊이 파고들어 해답을 찾고 끝을 맺으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SULFUR is a modern old-school action-adventure: Outsmart enemies, find treasure, improve weapons, harness powers. Delve deeper, find answers, make it end.

reviewHighlights.text: I think "potential" is how I would describe this game right now. The guns are very cool and inspired, but there's a lot to be desired in the main game...
This game lacks a clear identity. It tries to be both a roguelike with meta progression (stamps) and an extraction shooter, and ends up being mediocre...
